ygData.subject: Talking about AC...
ygData.msgSnippet: hmmmm... talking about AC... anyone research into that already? or anyone in the beta? worth trying out? any comments? ... From: LKW
ygData.messageBody:
hmmmm... talking about AC... anyone research into that already? or anyone in
the beta? worth trying out? any comments?

to
